entry.title: Draft BIP : fixed-schedule block size increase
entry.summary: Gavin Andresen, a prominent figure in the Bitcoin community, has submitted a Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) titled "Increase Maximum Block Size." The proposal, assigned number 101 by the BIP editor, aims to increase the maximum block size in order to improve transaction processing capacity on the Bitcoin network. Andresen plans to fill in the remaining TODOs and submit the proposal as a pull request to the BIP repository on the same day. This proposal is expected to generate significant discussion and debate within the Bitcoin ecosystem.
